channel.title: Ticket Exchange
channel.description:
Hey guys, so I am making a new shop that uses tickets (the ID for them is 4067) and I was wondering how I can make a shop like that. So like if i put lets say for an example, a blue partyhat, it would cost you 300 tickets. How would I do that? All help is appreciated, thanks :)
As always, I am using Pk Planet v3 and it is a 317

item.title: Ticket Exchange
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

I did that, but when I buy something with tickets it says you do not have enough coins, and if i buy it with coins, then it says you do not have enough tickets.

Read full topic
